Name: The Divine Speaker
About the game: A tale of breaking the fate that binds us all The Divine Speaker is a story-rich 18+ BL/yaoi visual novel where you'll follow alongside Raen, an orphan from the secluded city of Aurelia Cavella. Expelled from his home on a death sentence, his adventure will take him all over a world he didn't even know existed. Mysteries, magic, fantasy and more await you in this grand tale of fate, and how each person defies it. Three romanceable guys with varying degrees of morality 40+ original backgrounds designed to suck you into the world 70+ original illustrations, plus variations An original soundtrack with singers by the likes of Emi Evans, Morgan Berry and C.L Two hidden side couples you can watch get together (if you make the right choices!) An encylopedia that gets filled out as you play the game Streamer mode - mosaic all NSFW CGs with the click of a button Over 250,000 words of story for you to follow Full voice acting will be added in a free patch in the future!
